snippet: Relatives see possible signs that Iran eventually could release a man who has been held there for nearly two years on suspicions of spying.
abstract: Iran eases conditions for Amir Hekmati, Iranian-American former Marine incarcerated there for nearly two years on suspicions of being an American spy, possibly signaling his eventual release.
lead_paragraph: Relatives see possible signs that Iran eventually could release a man who has been held there for nearly two years on suspicions of spying.

headline.seo: Iran Eases Prison Conditions for Ex-Marine
headline.main: Prison Conditions Eased for Ex-Marine Held in Iran
headline.print_headline: Prison Conditions Eased For Ex-Marine Held in Iran
